site_url.description: The URL of the site for which the search analytics data is captured.

search_type.description: The type of search result (e.g., web, image, video) for the specific query.

date.description: The date for which the search analytics data is recorded.

query.description: The search query for which the search analytics data is recorded.

clicks.description: The number of times users clicked on the search result for the specific query.

impressions.description: The number of times the search result was displayed for the specific query.

ctr.description: The click-through rate (percentage) for the specific query, calculated as clicks divided by impressions.

position.description: The average position at which the search result appeared for the specific query.
